data.mission: To unblock and support development teams, ensuring they have the tools, knowledge, and resources needed to deliver high-quality software efficiently and effectively.
To provide robust monitoring, logging, and alerting solutions that ensure system reliability, performance, and security across the SiriusXM ecosystem.
To build and maintain the self-checkout product, ensuring it delivers a high-quality, user-friendly experience while utilizing scalable and secure cloud infrastructure.

links.data: Enablement team is supporting Self-Checkout team's development workflows
Enablement team is producing developer guides used by Self-Checkout team's engineers.
Observability team provides dashboards used as input to Self-Checkout's dashboards.
Observability team collaborates with Self-Checkout team to improve system monitoring.
Enablement team collaborates with Observability team to develop best practices for monitoring tools.
Self-Checkout uses knowledge bases maintained by Enablement team for development support.
Self-Checkout team consumes input data from Observability service level agreements for performance metrics.
Both Enablement and Observability teams attend weekly sync meetings.
Both Self-Checkout and Enablement teams attend daily stand-up meetings.
Both Self-Checkout and Observability teams attend bi-weekly sprint planning meetings.
